title: Tech Billionaire Stock Sales: The $16 Billion Cash-Out Strategy Behind 2025’s AI Boom
description: BitcoinWorldTech Billionaire Stock Sales: The $16 Billion Cash-Out Strategy Behind 2025’s AI BoomIn a year defined by unprecedented market highs, a staggering $16 billion flowed from corporate equity into the personal accounts of technology’s most prominent leaders during 2025. According to a comprehensive Bloomberg analysis of regulatory filings, executives like Jeff Bezos, Safra Catz, and Jensen Huang executed massive, pre-planned stock sales as an AI-fueled rally propelled [...]This post Tech Billionaire Stock Sales: The $16 Billion Cash-Out Strategy Behind 2025’s AI Boom first appeared on BitcoinWorld.

title: Content Forum calls for criminalising AI that digitally strips individuals' clothing
description: KUALA LUMPUR: The use of artificial intelligence (AI) to generate images that strip individuals of their clothing should be criminalised, the Communications and Multimedia Content Forum of Malaysia (CMCF) said.

title: Countries must move beyond seeing AI as a race, where one side must beat the other
description: When it comes to AI, cooperation between countries can yield greater benefits than working alone.
